# NSWorkspace.Authorization

**Class**

The authorization granted to the app by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
class Authorization
```

## Overview

To enable your app to prompt the user for these file permissions, you must have a Privileged File Operation entitlement. If you have an app on the Mac App Store or plan to submit your app for review, you can [https://developer.apple.com/go/?id=workspace-authorization].

## Performing Privileged Operations

- **requestAuthorization(to:completionHandler:)**: Requests authorization to perform a privileged file operation.
- **NSWorkspace.AuthorizationType**: The types of privileged file operations that can be authorized by the user.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
